description.hltext_display: Toshiba lanceert brilvrije 3D-televisie
description.content:
TOKIO - Het Japanse elektronicaconcern Toshiba heeft woensdag in Japan de eerste driedimensionale televisie gelanceerd waarbij kijkers geen gebruik hoeven te maken van een speciaal brilletje. Dat heeft Toshiba woensdag bekendgemaakt.
De Japanse consument moet een bedrag van 119.800 yen (1089 euro) neertellen voor de nieuwe 3D-televisie. Kijkers hoeven daarbij geen gebruik te maken van een speciale bril die het mogelijk maakt om diepte te creëren.

description.hltext_display: Andi Mallarangeng: Tiket Final AFF Kemahalan
description.content:
Andi Mallarangeng. TEMPO/Nurdiansah
TEMPO Interaktif, Jakarta -- Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga Andi Mallarangeng menilai tiket Final Piala AFF leg kedua, yang berlangsung di Stadion Gelora Bung Karno Rabu pekan depan, kelewat mahal. "Menurut saya tidak perlu naik," ujarnya kepada Tempo, Rabu (22/12).
Sejak PSSI mengumumkan harga tiket partai puncak kejuaraan sepak bola Asia Tenggara itu kemarin, Andi melanjutkan, banyak keluhan. Termasuk lewat SMS Presiden di nomor 9949. "Mereka minta agar tiket tidak naik," ujarnya.
Menurut Andi, kemenangan 100 persen yang diraih Firman Utina dan kawan-kawan merupakan prestasi yang dirayakan oleh seluruh rakyat Indonesia. "Sepak bola milik kita semua," kata Andi. "Jangan hanya bisa dinikmati oleh sebagian masyarakat."
Kemarin, dia menelepon Ketua Umum Persatuan Sepak Bola Seluruh Indonesia Nurdin Halid untuk menyampaikan keberatannya. "Tapi beliau sampaikan harga itu sudah ditetapkan," kata Andi.
Harga tiket terus menanjak sejak babak penyisihan. Untuk laga puncak, tiket termurah adalah Rp 75 ribu untuk Kategori 3 atau Tribun Atas. VIP Barat harus ditebus dengan Rp 500 ribu, dan VVIP harganya Rp 1 juta. Banderol tiket bagaikan langit dan bumi dengan leg pertama, berlangsung di Stadion Bukit Jalil, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, Ahad (26/10) yang dijual antara Rp 86 ribu dan Rp 144 ribu.
Andi menyorot kenaikan Tribun Atas. "Saya usulkan kelas ini jangan naik, sehingga ada kesempatan bagi mereka yang hanya bisa membeli tiket Rp 50 ribu untuk ikut menonton di stadion," katanya.
Dengan perhitungan 30 ribu tiket Tribun Atas, kenaikan dari Rp 50 ribu jadi Rp 75 ribu menghasilkan keuntungan Rp 750 juta bagi PSSI. "Bandingkan dengan keuntungan Rp30 miliar yang mereka dapatkan," katanya. Menurut Andi, keuntungan dari kenaikan itu tidak berarti jika ada sebagian suporter yang harus gigit jari karena tidak mampu membeli tiket.
Dia meyakini, 200 juta penduduk Indonesia sanggup memborong tiket dan memenuhi Gelora Bung Karno, berapa pun harganya. "Tapi kalau dinaikkan, berarti tidak semua golongan masyarakat bisa hadir," kata Andi.
Andi akan kembali menghubungi Nurdin Halid untuk meminta pembatalan kenaikan tiket. "Walau sudah diputuskan, kalau ada kemauan, pasti bisa turun," katanya. Sebab masih ada waktu sepekan sebelum pertandingan.
Siang tadi, usai Peringatan Hari Ibu di Taman Mini Indonesia Indah, Presiden Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono juga mengeluhkan harga tiket yang mencekik.

description.hltext_display: Barcellona fermato dall'orgoglio basco
description.content:
L'Athletic Bilbao strappa un prezioso 0-0 contro i blaugrana nell'andata degli ottavi di finale di Coppa del Re. Pareggiano anche Valencia e Villarreal.
www.sportal.it
L'Athletic Bilbao può sognare: ha fermato il Barcellona al Camp Nou. E' finita 0-0 la sfida tra i baschi e l'undici di Guardiola, gara valida per l'andata degli ottavi di finale della Coppa del Re. I blaugrana, reduci da dieci successi consecutivi, non sono riusciti a mettere paura ai biancorossi che hanno amministrato senza troppi problemi la partita. La gara di ritorno si giocherà tra quindici giorni, il 5 gennaio, nella tana dei baschi che proveranno a fare il gran colpo eliminando la regina del calcio spagnolo. Finisce a reti bianche anche la sfida tra Valencia e Villarreal.

description.hltext_display: Santa Stops by Sioux City Schools
description.content:
Let us know what you think! Click here to go to the KPTH Soapbox to post your own comments and view others Soapbox comments.
(SIOUX CITY, IA) For some lucky Sioux City students, Santa Claus came to town a little early!
"Jolly Old Saint Nick" dropped by Leeds Elementary Tuesday morning, visiting more than 600 pre-school through 5th graders.
Students had fun singing songs and sharing Christmas wish lists with "Kris Kringle."
Santa even had a helper handing out candy canes.
If you didn't see "Father Christmas" Tuesday... don't worry! Santa may just visit a few other elementary schools during the week, so keep your eyes peeled.
This story was reported by Jacob Heller. You can contact him at: jheller@kpth.com

description.hltext_display: Paw in winter
description.content:
Changeable weather—news report: More snow yesterday, ice floating in the rivers.. In the morning it was noticed that the weather had considerably moderated. This, however, was but the preparation for a snowfall which subsequently came down. While you prepare your home, roof, ranch, or farm for this winter, you might need to consider to prep your pet for winter time as well.
l Paw Care
The dry winter air, sharp edges of ice, salt on the road, and bitter cold can be very tough for a pet's paw and pad. If careless, it might cause cuts, crack or split. It is very similar to what human might have in the winter.
l ShelterShelter is a requirement for any outdoor pet. Keeping them out of the rain, wind and any other outside elements is a must for their health and safety.
l Food
If your dog engages in a lot of outdoor activities, increase his food supply to help keep his coat thick and healthy.
l Comfort
Provide your companion four legged friends with a warm place to sleep. Get a warm blanket or pillow which are especially cozy for your pets.
l Dangerous Items
Coolant and anti-freeze are very poisonous to pets. Keep away from the reach of your pet and important to keep an eye on them when they are around the area you place these items.
Taking the appropriate measures to ensure that your dog is well-equipped for the winter months will result in a happier and healthier winter season for both you and your pet. Well prepared, then you will have peace at mind taking your pet for a walk or outdoor activity.

description.hltext_display: 金立手机：中国风时尚UI界面 荷塘M500堪比智能机
description.content:
用过金立M500音乐手机的人都说“很好用”，看来金立早几年强调的“好用易用”理念终于发扬光大，得到更多用户认可。虽然在硬件和性能上M500不能和智能手机相比，但是对于女性用户来说绝对不错，荷塘月色，见字即可知物之意境，无论是外形的色彩搭配还是整体中国风的定位，都彰显中国女性的古典柔和之美。
毫无疑问，金立M500最大的亮点就是音乐功能，它具有SRS认证，机身内置Wolfson专业音乐芯片，音乐表现超乎想象。SRS WOW是SRS Labs公司针对MP3等新一代的音频格式而开发的一种音质增强技术，这种技术基于人耳的生理声学和心理声学原理，可显著扩展声场的宽度、高度和深度，使声音变得更加自然、悦耳。
同时金立M500拥有风暴播放器，加上手机本身的重力感应功能，可以进一步对音效等细节进行具体设置，像iPhone一样只需晃动手机，就可实现音乐的跳转。M500还支持Real影院功能，除了可以播放MP4、3GP、FLV等主流格式的视频文件外还可以播放专业的媒体RMVB格式，让你不用转换轻松观看各种电影，具体的播放效果也十分令人满意。
虽然不是智能手机，但其功能依然强大。内置了手机QQ、MSN和移动飞信等各种即时通信工具，你可以随时保持与好友无缝沟通。当然你可以通过UC浏览器时刻关注天下大事。总体而言，一款千元多的手机，能在设计、功能上均有特色，算十分给力啦。

description.hltext_display: Quatre intoxiqués au monoxyde de carbone à Estaimpuis
description.content: ESTAIMPUIS - Un couple d'Estaimpuis et ses deux enfants ont Ã©tÃ© intoxiquÃ©s au monoxyde de carbone dans la nuit de mardi Ã mercredi. Les quatre victimes ont Ã©tÃ© admises dans un centre hospitalier du Nord de la France. Les pompiers de Tournai et une équipe des pompiers d'Estaimpuis sont intervenus mercredi vers 1h dans une habitation de Néchin, dans l'entité d'Estaimpuis. Victimes d'une intoxication au monoxyde de carbone, deux adultes, âgés de 39 et de 41 ans, et leurs deux enfants, âgés de 12 et 16 ans, ont d'abord été hospitalisés à la clinique Notre-Dame de Tournai. L'état de santé des victimes a nécessité leur transfert en cours de nuit vers le Centre Hospitalier Régional de Lille (France). Cette unité de soins est la seule dans la zone frontalière franco-belge à être équipée d'un caisson "hyper bar".

description.hltext_display: WikiLeaks: Family access threat over Fiji coup
description.content:
New Zealand threatened Fiji's military chief Commodore Frank Bainimarama and his wife with the loss of access to their grandchildren if he staged a coup, WikiLeaks cables reveal.
Commodore Bainimarama and his wife Mary came to New Zealand in November 2006 to attend a grand-daughter's First Holy Communion in Wellington.
As he passed through Auckland he told Fairfax Media that when he returned to Fiji he would stage a coup on December 4 to overthrow the government of Laisenia Qarase.
This prompted then Foreign Minister Winston Peters and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to set up urgent meetings with Commodore Bainimarama and, later, Qarase who was flown down on an RNZAF flight.
The surprising part of the approaches is revealed by then US Ambassador Bill McCormick who advised Washington on what was to be said to Commodore Bainimarama.
He revealed that Winston Peters was “on travel in Auckland” and was too busy to see Commodore Bainimarama.
Unusually, New Zealand's “talking points: were then put to Commodore Bainimarama by the British Defence Attache based in Wellington, Nigel Lloyd, at a lunch.
The sharp tone of the “talking points” and the open threat over grandchildren probably explains Bainimarama's now abiding hostility toward New Zealand.
The issued talking points even provided the line of language to use.
“I gather you are down here on a private visit for your grand-daughter's first communion - a significant family occasion. I hope you enjoy your visit,” the cable says Lloyd was instructed to say.
He warned Commodore Bainimarama “very strongly” against a coup, saying there would be serious consequences.
Various consequences would follow, including sanctions against Fiji and UN and Commonwealth condemnation.
“You need to understand that if you do something stupid you will not be able to operate around the Pacific. Neither we, Australia, Britain nor the United States would be able to work with you, or offer any assistance,” the talking points said.
If Commodore Bainimarama did not listen, the warning said, New Zealand would change its travel advisory to discourage tourism to Fiji.
“There would also be personal implications for you and your family. We would ban you, as well as others associated with a coup, and possibly your family, from entering New Zealand,” Mr Lloyd warned Commodore Bainimarama.
In case Commodore Bainimarama did not listen, Mrs Lloyd was also briefed on talking points she was to make with Merry Bainimarama.
She was instructed “to emphasise to Bainimarama's wife that should there be a coup, the Commodore and she would no longer be able to travel to New Zealand to visit their grandchildren”.
Commodore Bainimarama returned to Fiji, staged his coup and has since then expelled at various times three New Zealand diplomats.
His grandchildren are back in Fiji.

event_or_fact.property: New Zealand would change its travel advisory to discourage tourism to Fiji

description.hltext_display: ・周林燕出席华东物资片会并调研
GARMIN手持机“裸泳” 圣诞“淋浴”很给力
description.content:
2011年1月1日将在中国大陆上市的美国Garmin公司多款最新款手持GPS产品，除了应用于专业行业市场，具有测量、测绘功能外，还具备卫星定位和导航功能。其中Garmin 户外产品Oregon450、的推出，改变了以往GPS手持机多适用于专业行业市场，很少用于山野密林户外活动使用的情况，可以为您户外运动、、徒步探险、密林休闲旅游保驾护航。
Oregon450的功能包括：240X400像素的触摸显示屏，防水和抗震功能，两节AA点就能提供约小时续航能力，，电子罗盘，气压海拔，可定制的桌面显示，Garmin在线支持自定义地图，提高GPS的适用性。
下面重点介绍下GARMIN手持机(行货)的防水功能：为了迎接圣诞，Oregon450特意“沐浴”迎圣诞(友情提醒：水货不防水，雨天使用水货时一定要裹上几个塑料袋，以免机器进水报废，无法导航)
开始淋浴：
水漫脚背：
水位上升至腰部：
水到脖颈：
水漫头顶：
水下潜泳：
请注意：此过程中，机器一直处于开机和工作状态!
Garmin副总裁丹巴特尔表示：“与以往相比，Garmin Oregon450提供了直观的，可以让人更容易的探索和享受他们周围的世界。而开放的自定义地图功能，可以方便你无缝规划你的出游路线以及重温或在线分享你的探险历程。”
Oregon450一大特点是能显示带有投影的立体地形图，这样可以清楚的看到地形的高度(海拔)变化，而且还可以旋转地图，通过改变观看角度看清楚如：登山路线，道路，海岸线，河流湖泊，公园，森林和荒野等地貌情况。
用户也可以导出自己的旅行轨迹和路点数据，然后在Facebook，Twitter以及上分享，可以共享路点、轨迹、路线，以及其他旅途中的发现，可以通过无线方式互相传输，分享给其他地区的用户。你要做的：只是按下“发送”按钮!
GARMIN华北独家总代理星火伟业友情提醒您：享受生活，户外运动时带上GARMIN手持机(行货)，将与你风雨同舟为您护航! 编辑：下周将推出GARMIN手持机“裸泳”系列之：迎新年 潜泳更给力!

description.hltext_display: アメリカン・パワーメタル代表ICED EARTH、ライヴDVDをリリース！
description.content:
12月22日(水)16時32分配信 Jon Schaffer（g）率いるアメリカン・パワーメタル代表格、ICED EARTH（アイスド・アース）。ニュー・マテリアルはライヴDVD！『Festivals Of The Wicked』がCentury Media recordsより2011年初頭に発売予定。
2部作『Framing Armageddon』、『The Crucible Of Man』に、シングル「I Walk Among You」やボーナス・ディスクを追加した豪華5枚組ボックス・セット『Box Of The Wicked』を3月にリリースしたICED EARTH。2011年第1弾リリースは〈Wacken〉や〈Rock Hard〉など、ビッグ・フェス出演時の模様を中心に収録した映像作品。Matt Barlow、Tim“Ripper”Owens（ティム・オーウェンズ）両ヴォーカリスト在籍時のステージングをまとめて楽しめてしまうお得な（？）内容です！毎度の如く、ミスターJon Schafferのステイトメントによれば自信を持って激押し！とのこと！発売日等詳細は近日発表予定となっておりますので、詳しくはオフィシャル・サイトをチェックです！
【関連記事】アメリカン・パワーメタル重鎮JAG PANZER、ニュー・アルバムをリリース！メロディック・パワーメタルBALFLARE、3rdアルバムがボーナス・トラック追加で再発、、を調べる 最終更新:12月22日(水)16時32分

description.hltext_display: How has the DNC affected Telemarketing
description.content:
Do-not-call legislation has without a doubt changed the Telemarketing industry. The universe of available prospects to telemarketers has decreased substantially.
The FTC reported that as of Dec 8, 2009 there were 191.5 million numbers on the national registry.
And the growth of the Do-Not-Call list does not appear to be slowing down...
2006 to 2007 an additional 13 million numbers were registered 2007 to 2008 this number grew by 27 million 2008 to 2009 showed a growth of over 18 million numbers (about an 11% increase).
To add to the Telemarketers' woes, there are less Phone Lists available. When the Do-Not-Call list was put into action, some list owners decided to remove their lists completely from the market. They simply did not want to have to deal with the DNC program.
Although the numbers portray a pretty bleak picture, there is still a market for Telemarketing.
The names that are left, often respond really well. The bottom line, many people who have not registered their names haven't because they want to be called!
There has also been a significant drop in the number of businesses accessing and/or paying for the national DNC registry, meaning there is now less competition for Telemarketers.
In 2009:
3,924 businesses paid for the list 40,406 businesses received the list using the 5 or fewer area codes exemption to paying 1,002 businesses that accessed the list claiming complete exemption Compare these numbers to the first year the national registry was launched and you can clearly see the decline:
50% drop in the number of businesses actually paying for the list; 37% drop in the number of businesses seeking 5 or fewer area codes; 32% drop in the number of businesses that accessed the list claiming an exemption In all, over the five year period during which the national registry has been in operation, there are now over 28,000 fewer businesses (an overall drop of 38%) taking part in the program.
In addition, we have seen a shift in the marketing mix from solely telemarketing, to a greater reliance on multichannel marketing with e-mail and postal lists. Telemarketing now is being used as more of a follow-up communication method, rather than a primary sales channel.
So all is not lost for Telemarketing. It's still is an easy, cost-effective way to reach targeted prospects, it consistently outperforms all other forms of marketing and it provides you with an immediate response.

description.hltext_display: Saving Satan’s Backsliders: Becoming Free From the Judas in Me, Published by Outskirts Press
description.author: Outskirts Press, Inc
description.content: --(PR.com)-- Outskirts Press, Inc. has published Becoming Free From the Judas in Me by Jim Gloyd. The author's most recent book to date is a 5.5 x 8.5 paperback in the religion, Christian life and inspirational category and is available worldwide on book retailer websites such as Amazon and Barnes & Noble. The webpage at www.outskirtspress.com/thejudasinme was launched simultaneously with the book's publication.This book is dedicated to the great number of fallen Christians who are caught within the grip of Satans vacuum -- thus branding them backsliders. Whether astray or repented, whether fulfilling the blinded lusts of an again fallen flesh or combating mass weapons of condemnation, with two roads before them -- one leading to the cross and the other to the noose -- they are not forgotten!The seed of the Word of God still falls by the wayside, atop the stones and among the thorns. The devil is still a self-made heir of stolen truth, hopes and dreams, the light and life of mankind, and remains with the fallen souls never to be acquainted with repentance, bound to broaden -- the bowels of hell.Author Gloyd asks: While dwelling in a fallen state encumbered by Adam, do you feel condemned from a certain sin? After all, you werent supposed to mess up! While trying to forget a backslidden condition that is now under the shed blood of Christ, have you fought devils you never knew hell unleashed? Have these fallen angels -- now spirits of darkness -- dared to cause you to think your sins have been too evil, too many, too frequent, or too continuous that Calvary refuses to come to your aid? Youre not alone and there is help -- you too can be free from what used to be The Judas in Me.121 pages in length, Becoming Free From the Judas in Me is being aggressively promoted to appropriate markets with a focus on the religion, Christian life and inspirational category. With U.S. wholesale distribution through Ingram and Baker & Taylor, and pervasive online availability through Amazon, Barnes & Noble and elsewhere, Becoming Free From the Judas in Me meets consumer demand through both retail and library markets with a suggested retail price of $13.95.Additionally, Becoming Free From the Judas in Me can be ordered by retailers or wholesalers for the maximum trade discount price set by the author in quantities of ten or more from the Outskirts Press Direct bookstore at www.outskirtspress.com/bookstore.ISBN: 9781432755782Format: 5.5 x 8.5 paperback whiteSRP: $13.95For more information or to contact the author, visit www.outskirtspress.com/thejudasinme.About the author:Jim Gloyd was delivered by God on his deathbed. Having what appeared to have been a stroke, not being able to move or speak, he cried out to the Lord in his mind. With only seconds left, the Lord sent an angel to rescue him, granting Jim the blessing of sight.An accomplished writer, Jim was amongst the first graduating class of World Harvest Bible College. He has gone on to finish his Bachelors in Leadership and Ministry at Ohio Christian University and has served in various areas of ministry including pastoral and evangelism.Mr. Gloyd knows what it is like to eat of Adams fruit, as he had suffered untold agony before the Lord freed him from a backslidden state. He now endeavors to pull as many backsliders and sinners as he can from the clutches of sin.About Outskirts Press, Inc.Outskirts Press, Inc. offers full-service, custom self-publishing and book marketing services for authors seeking a cost-effective, fast, and flexible way to publish and distribute their books worldwide while retaining all their rights and full creative control. Available for authors globally at www.outskirtspress.com and located on the outskirts of Denver, Colorado, Outskirts Press represents the future of book publishing, today.###Outskirts Press, Inc., 10940 S. Parker Rd - 515, Parker, Colorado 80134http://outskirtspress.com 1-888-OP-BOOKS

description.hltext_display: Much ado in Faroes
Uncle Eugene in Cyberspace
description.content:
It is in the nature of us as human beings to be curious. It makes us what we are. It is this curiosity that has given us the ability to find out more and do more.
But it is this same curiosity that gets us into more trouble than we can imagine.
Cyber crooks use super impact news issues to attack the unsuspecting curiosity that we have.
Michael Jackson, Patrick Swayze and Swine Flu are just a few of the news event that were used by cyber crooks to exploit unsuspecting users into using malware, scams and purchase of dubious products.
Given the amount of news coverage that Uncle Eugene has received in the past few days, the same results could apply.
Whilst it is usually the international contingency of cyber crime that uses sensationalist news, the local guys must not be overlooked.
So mails pertaining to the AWB and Eugene Terreblanche should be treated with caution, especially if donations and help to access his offshore millions are concerned.
Whilst the threat is currently potential, it should not be discounted.

description.hltext_display: Ylen hd-lähetykset eivät saa sotkea markkinoita
description.content:
Markkinointi ja Mainonta, 9:47
Ylen hallintoneuvoston työvaliokunta valmistelee hd-palveluiden ennakkoarviointia yhdessä helsinkiläisen asianajotoimisto Borenius & Kemppisen kanssa.
Merkittävien uusien palveluiden ennakkoarviointimenettely noudattaa Euroopan komission linjauksia ja sen tarkoituksena on selvittää julkisen palvelun arvo ja niiden vaikutukset markkinoihin.
Ensimmäinen ennakkoarviointimenettelyä edellyttävä merkittävä uusi palvelu on Ylen säännöllisten teräväpiirto- eli hd-lähetysten aloittaminen keväällä 2011.
– Suomessa ennakkoarviointimenettely on pitkälti samanlainen kuin Saksassa. Myös muissa EU-maissa kuten Britanniassa, Tanskassa ja Ruotsissa on hankkeita merkittävien uusien palveluiden ennakkoarviointiin, sanoo Ylen hallintoneuvoston puheenjohtaja Kimmo Sasi.
Sasin mukaan arvioijaksi valittu Borenius & Kemppinen valikoitui tarjouskilpailussa, jossa mukana oli lakiasiaintoimistojen lisäksi media- ja tilintarkastustoimistoja.
– Tarjouskilpailussa painotimme enemmän laatua kuin hintaa. Borenius & Kemppisella on vahva osaaminen kilpailuasioissa, Sasi sanoo.
Yle varaa julkisen palvelun televisiotoimintaan kapasiteettia yhden teräväpiirto- eli hd-kanavan lähettämistä varten. Suunniteltu hd-kanava koostetaan Yle TV1- ja Yle TV2 -kanavien tarjonnasta. Kanava merkitsee tuotanto- ja lähetysteknisen laadun parantumista, ei sisällöllistä markkinamuutosta. Katsojille maksuton hd-kanava olisi samoin ehdoin kaikkien operaattorien saatavilla.
Hd-lähetysten tavoitteena on toteuttaa Ylen julkisen palvelun tehtävää muuttuvassa toimintaympäristössä.
Ylen palvelukehitys ei lopu hd-lähetyksiin. Sasi vilauttaa myös mahdollisuutta tarjota Ylen tuotantoa iPadissa. – Tästä ei kuitenkaan ole vielä suunnitelmia, hän sanoo.

description.hltext_display: 18 granaten in plantsoen
description.content:
IJMUIDEN - Achttien (mortier)granaten zijn in het plantsoen langs de Heerenduinweg in IJmuiden uit de grond gehaald. Ze hebben diameters van twee tot twaalf centimeter, lagen 20 tot 50 centimeter onder de grond en bevatten samen zo’n vijf kilo springstof.
De gemeente startte een onderzoek nadat een bouwbedrijf al gravend op een granaat stuitte, en de eerste resultaten zijn nu bekend. Gisteren zijn de granaten op het strand van IJmuiden tot ontploffing gebracht.

description.hltext_display: ・11月我国物流运行加快增长
description.content:
中国物流与采购联合会
中国物流信息中心
今年以来，我国经济总体形势良好，物流运行一直保持较快增长，11月更是呈现出加快增长态势，预计全年社会物流总额可达125万亿元以上，同比增长16%左右。11月我国物流运行的主要特点是：
一、物流需求增速加快。据初步统计核算，当月社会物流总额为11.9万亿元，为今年以来单月最高，同比增幅比10月提高5个百分点。1-11月累计，社会物流总额为114.6万亿元，按可比价格计算，同比增长16.2%，增幅比1-10月回落0.3个百分点。其中工业品物流总额103.4万亿元，按可比价格计算，同比增长15.8%，增幅比1-10月回落0.3个百分点；进口货物物流总额为8.5万亿元，按可比价格计算，同比增长23.6%，增幅比1-10月回落0.4个百分点。
图１：2010年各月社会物流总额及增长变化情况
从物流实物量情况看，11月货运量同比增长19.3%，增幅比10月提高4.3个百分点；货运周转量同比增长17.2%，增幅比10月提高6.7个百分点。1-11月累计货运量同比增长14.8%，货运周转量同比增长14%，增幅分别比1-10月提高0.4个和0.1个百分点。港口货物吞吐量同比增长15.9%，增幅比1-10月提高0.5个百分点；集装箱吞吐量同比增长20%，增幅与1-10月持平。
图2：2010年各月物流实物量增长变化情况（%）
二、物流相关行业固定资产投资较快增长。 1-11月物流相关行业固定资投资完成额2.6万亿元，同比增长23.2%，增幅比1-10月提高0.3个百分点。其中交通运输业完成投资额1.9万亿元，同比增长23.6%，增幅比1-10月提高0.1个百分点。仓储邮政业完成投资额2018.3亿元，同比增长31.3%，增幅比1-10月提高3.2个百分点；贸易业完成投资额4732.3亿元，同比增长18.1%，增幅比1-10月回落0.5个百分点。
三、物流价格涨跌互现，物流企业成本压力加大。11月中国沿海（散货）运价指数，受煤炭和粮食运输需求减缓的影响，出现回调，月底收于1629.5点，较月初下跌7.9%，但11月均值环比上涨6.3%；大中型公路货运企业运价指数比上月上涨2.8%，中小型公路货运企业运价则下降1.8%。国际方面，BDI 指数在需求放缓、运力增多双重因素影响下，连续下跌，11月末报收于2099 点，较月初下跌20.7%， 11月均值2321点，环比下降372点。从PMI指数看，11月物流业收费价格比10月下降2个百分点，物流业中间投入价格指数则比10月上涨1.1个百分点，两者之间的差距呈扩大之势。
图4：2010年各月物流业PMI指数情况 单位：亿元
今年以来物流要素价格不断攀升，物流企业成本压力持续加大。面对原材料、燃料、动力、油品价格和用工成本上升趋势，物流企业运营面临巨大挑战，惟有练好内功，不断提升物流服务水平和能力，才能占据主动，化“危”为“机”。

description.hltext_display: Kritiskt mot varg i Sörmland
73.684: segundo quinto premio del día
description.content: 9 de la mañana de este 22 de diciembre. Comienza la Navidad con el tradicional sorteo de la lotería. Los bombos con las 85.000 bolas ya han empezado a girar. La suerte está echada y millones de españoles siguen con ilusión el transcurso de estas horas en las que la fortuna puede llamar a su puertas. Los niños de San Ildefonso comienzan a cantar los 1.787 premios que repartirán más de 2.320 millones de euros. 58.697 es el número de un quinto premio, el más madrugador, que se ha cantado a las 9.33 de la mañana. Dotado con 50.000 euros a la serie, ha recaído en Galicia, Cataluña y Castilla y León. La principal novedad del popular sorteo es el cambio de sede. El objetivo es tener un espacio más amplio para la celebración. Según los datos facilitados por Loterías y Apuestas del Estado (LAE), el aforo del nuevo salón se eleva a unas 2.000 personas, frente a las 300 butacas que había en el antiguo salón. Otra novedad es la posibilidad de cobrar los premios grandes' al día siguiente, en lugar de tener que esperar nueve días para hacerse con el dinero. Los protagonistas de la jornada son los niños de San Ildefonso -que cantan los números y los premios- y los bombos, que, construidos con una aleación de latón y bronce, reparten suerte desde 2006. El más grande, el de los números, pesa casi 1.000 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 1,65 metros; el de los premios, más pequeño, pesa 125 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 0,60. A partir de las 9.00 horas da comienzo el espectáculo. Antes, todos aquellos que quieran comprobar que su número está dentro de los bombos puede hacerlo. Después, la suerte está echada. Los bombos comenzarán a girar y durante aproximadamente tres horas y media llegarán los 1.787 premios, entre ellos el 'Gordo' y otros doce premios mayores. El primer premio está dotado con tres millones de euros, lo que supone que el portador de un décimo agraciado se embolsará 300.000 euros. El segundo está dotado con un millón de euros (100.000 euros al décimo); el tercero con 500.000 euros (50.000 euros el décimo); dos cuartos premios dotado cada uno con 200.000 (20.000 euros por décimo) y ocho quintos premios dotado cada uno con 50.000 euros (5.000 euros por décimo).

description.hltext_display: 700 foreign troops died in Afghanistan this year
description.content:
The death toll of foreign troops in Afghanistan has surpassed 700 for the year, according to new figures released by an independent website Tuesday.
ICasualties.org, which monitors international troop casualties in Iraq and Afghanistan, said 701 soldiers died in the Afghan war during 2010, the deadliest year since the US-led invasion in 2001.
In 2009, 521 foreign troops died, compared to 295 the year before. Most of the victims this year were US soldiers - 493, followed by 101 British troops, the website said.
Nearly 150,000 international soldiers are based in Afghanistan to fight the Taliban insurgency that is growing after nine years of war.
--DPA
pm
( 118 Words)
2010-12-21-14:44:39 (IANS)

description.hltext_display: Article Marketing Is It Dying?
description.content:
Good articles are dying and making a way to the video world of technology. Articles are and can be very eye catching. A good article can almost make one close their eyes and imagine they are in the place being described within the article writers' words.
Technology has come a long way, yes but we still like to see things in print and if article marketing is dying; what will we do with that? Or shall I say without that? The world needs article marketing simply because it sells to our public followers who enjoy what one writes and sometimes gives them a place to go even if it is imaginable.
There are magnitudes of strategies for article marketing these days that do involve technology. We have email, we have websites and the list goes on and on. The general population often wonders sometimes if it is spam or not and that is where we need to eliminate and come up with a better strategy and get it out there that we are not spam.
Email marketing is very data driven by consumer's age groups, race and ethnicity along with what they are purchasing and so forth. You can actually combine these two marketing strategies to be consistently a working progress together. You can have email promotions and you can track them to see how well it's working for your business.
With the use of article marketing you will have to water it to make it grow and prosper if you are looking for positive result. As with any marketing tool you have to keep up with the end and the outcome you are looking for by keeping proper recordings on how well it's working for you.
Article marketing isn't dying; you just have to take a different approach at it to get it where you are wanting it to be. Nothing will die if you work hard at what you do! Article writing is very persuasive all on it's on and you have to remember that most people are on the go these days however they get to their offices and they sit for a moment and catch up on the latest being they read articles and they read article marketing.
There's no doubt in mind that article marketing is def. here to stay because it's more personable than mass technology is or will ever be.

description.hltext_display: ROCKETMAN / ふかわりょう、一発録りアルバムをリリース！
description.content:
ROCKETMAN / 、一発録りアルバムをリリース！ 12月22日(水)16時32分配信/ 、一発録りアルバムをリリース！ 2010年で音楽活動10周年を迎えた、ROCKETMANことが12月22日（水）、iTunes限定アルバム『re:dancemusic〜rocketman non-stop mix〜』をリリース！ 本作には、ふかわのDJプレイをそのまま収録。手を加えていない“一発録り”ノンストップMIX音源となっています！
今年iTunesにて総合チャート1位を獲得し話題になった『dancemusic』を含む、今年リリースされた楽曲を中心に8曲が収録されており、音楽活動10周年の年に相応しい“集大成”ともいえる作品となった『re:dancemusic〜rocketman non-stop mix〜』。ふかわは「今まで何千回とDJをしてきましたが、音源として聴くのは初めてなので、とても新鮮でした。PC上でなく、実際にDJプレイしながらMIXした“一発録り”なので、正確さはない代わりに、その場の臨場感が伝わればうれしいです」と語っています。
なお、12月25日（土）には、東京・大井町きゅりあん大ホールにて、としてのイベント〈第5回フニオチコンテスト〉が開催。ゲスト審査員には清水ミチコ、清春、蛭子能収、上原美優らが参加します！

description.hltext_display: 电子书也能很给力 盛大Bambook十大亮点
description.content:
盛大Bambook自从出现后所引起的争议和似乎一点不比和之战少。Bambook的出现，对于整个行业的发展，在行业标准的建立起着至关重要的作用。同时，Bambook的出现对于盛大网络对于网络迪斯尼的布局中，也是极为精妙的一笔。
在有着起点文学网、晋江、红袖添香、榕树下等几座巨型书库，以及拥有网络小说行业最多的优秀作者之后，网络小说的布局开始逐渐衍生至市场。这一步网络到现实的衍生，将是每部作品在核心价值体现上，呈现几何价值提升的关键一步。而作为内容载体的Bambook，无论是在产品设计上，还是在内容规划上都呈现着一款互联网产品应有的品质。
价格很给力 “相同配置，这个要卖到甚至更高”。这个是很多销售人员对于Bambook在价格上的评价。正式发售价999元让所有真正想拥有一本的人找不到任何拒绝它的理由。 “书城”很给力
基于云计算的云中书城成为了Bambook在内容运营和对Bambook的内容支持上至关重要的一个环节。累计亿字原创文学内容、近万部版权作品、余种电子期刊杂志，多家传统出版社、多位中国当代传统作家和编剧、万名盛大文学旗下作家辛勤写作，每日新增1亿字。一连串的数字令人对这座文字宝库，绝对有实力以“云中书城”来著称。
设计很给力
Bambook不仅仅是一款简单的互联网产品，更是一件艺术品，无论是在外形的设计上，还是内容的UI上，都无不体现了用户体验为优先的考虑，如何让用户在使用上更顺手，如何让用户体验变得更好，是每一位Bambook设计师最关注的。
作者也给力
盛大文学旗下几座文学网站有着网络文学最多的优秀作者，他们是所有作品来源的保障。谁拥有了他们，就拥有了网络文学在“上游”的主动权，这些金字招牌的作者将是Bambook在内容上提供最坚实的保障。
内容很给力
Bambook背靠着盛大文学这座大山，以极其丰富的资源保证了Bambook在内容上，你这辈子也看不完。起点文学网、晋江、红袖添香等重量级书库在盛大文学的资源整合下，对Bambook做内容上的支持，这个支持相当给力。
服务很给力
盛大网络在服务上，保障了用户在购买Bambook到之后使用上的一条龙服务。用户在使用过程中需要帮助时，能从各种渠道及时给您帮助。在购买上，网络订购、电话咨询及订购，货到付款等等，多渠道开展，让您在购买上畅通无阻。
更新很给力 传统的，往往是一个版本，一个型号。用户在更新软件上需要话费更多的成本投入。而Bambook在云梯软件(官网免费下载)的配套服务下，通过固件更新，会持续不断的对于Bambook的软件，以及UI，内容做更新，以保证用户手中的Bambook在版本上，绝对是行业领先水平。
书友会很给力
Bambook首创云中书友会，Bambook的又以核心价值分享得到了充分的体现，分享与交流在2.0的概念中得到了充分的体现，这将成为Bambook的又一核心价值体现，而在整个Bambook的战略布局上，云中书友会这颗种子，也将逐渐壮大。
横屏很给力
Bambook在为满足更多用户需求上下足了功夫，最近的1118新版本固件中就应用户要求，Bambook开始支持横屏阅读，以满足用户在阅读上的更多需求，虚心的提取用户建议与意见，分析开发并运用于产品中，这是Bambook认真做事，孜孜不倦继续走下去的重要原因。
战略计划很给力
Bambook亏本销售、云中书城的建设、分享渠道的建立等等，每一步都展现着盛大文学在使用Bambook在战略布局上的清晰意图，舍弃了眼前一时的利益，为了使行业更健康稳健的发展，为了在内容上体现更高的价值，为了使刚刚起步的中国行业有属于自己的行业标准，Bambook一直在努力，相信在盛大的努力下，未来好看的书会

description.hltext_display: AFC South: Colts' ground game, defense answer the call
description.content: (Sports Network) - Anyone who has watched Peyton Manning and the Indianapolis Colts over the past few seasons hasn't seen the club challenged very often. However, 2010 hasn't been one of domination by the club and the Colts went into Sunday's home game against the Jaguars needing a win to prevent Jacksonville from clinching the AFC South. That's just what they got; a 34-24 victory that saw Indianapolis use its ground game to control things while stopping the Jags' red-hot run attack. Turns out that was head coach Jim Caldwell's plan all along. "Those were our two challenges. Coach Caldwell made that challenge to us [last] Monday," said Manning. "He challenged both the interior fronts on both sides of the ball, for us to run the ball and for our defense to stop the run. Both answered the bell. Both answered the challenge." Running back Donald Brown ripped off a career-high 129 yards and scored a touchdown, while the Colts held the Jaguars' Maurice Jones-Drew to just 46 yards on 15 carries. Jones-Drew had gone over 100 yards in six straight games. And with that the Colts are back in control of the AFC South. Two victories over the season's final two weeks -- at Oakland this Sunday before a home finale on Jan. 2 versus Tennessee -- and Indianapolis will have its ninth straight postseason berth and seventh division title in eight seasons. The 8-6 Colts have now won two straight since a three-game slide threatened to derail their season. "This is one win. It is all about Oakland this week," said Manning. "You can take a step back and you feel like these last two wins don't mean as much. Hopefully we can feed off of a little momentum of two wins in a row and play well on the road. But we know we will have our hands full going out there. At Oakland is a tough place to play against a good football team." The rest of the NFL is so used to seeing Manning make plays with his arm, that Brown and the ground game probably snuck up on the Jaguars. Manning said the success of the running backs also helped the play action, which the Colts ran during the second quarter on Austin Collie's second touchdown reception of the game. Collie, though would exit the game early with his second concussion of the season. The wideout had missed three straight and four of the last five games with a concussion suffered versus the Philadelphia Eagles on Nov. 7. Caldwell didn't have an update on Collie after the game, other than to confirm the concussion and say the receiver was doing fine, but its tough to imagine him suiting up again this season. TITANS: The Tennessee Titans were able to give their home fans one more victory in 2010 and keep their slim playoff hopes alive in the process. The Titans snapped a six-game skid with a 31-17 win over the Houston Texans in their final home game of the season. Tennessee ends the year with road games against Kansas City and Indianapolis and needs to win both games, plus get some losses from the Colts and Jaguars, to make the postseason. "We're aware of those things. We understand what our situation is, who needs to do what," quarterback Kerry Collins said. "Is it a long shot? Yeah, it is but that's not going to change our MO. Want to come out, keep playing, crazier things have happened but we've got to take care of our business and we did that today." The 6-8 Titans picked up their first victory since Oct. 24 and did so without tight end Bo Scaife in the lineup. The six-year veteran was a healthy inactive, with second-year tight end Jared Cook, 23, getting the start. Cook ended with three catches for 42 yards, while Scaife had caught two touchdown passes last Thursday against the Colts to give him a career-high four on the season. "It was different for us. We're use to having Bo out there. [Head coach] Jeff [Fisher] made that decision and went along with it," Collins said. Fisher had mentioned last week that the Titans could start giving some different players a chance in the lineup. Fisher said after Sunday's game that the Titans needed to dress extra defensive linemen due to injuries, leaving Scaife and safety Vincent Fuller as the odd-men out. However, it is worth nothing that Scaife told The Tennessean last Wednesday that he thought the locker room might be divided due to the issues between Fisher and injured quarterback Vince Young, who was on the sidelines for part of the second half on Sunday. Young is on injured reserve due to a thumb injury. Despite those issues, the Titans were still able to enjoy Sunday's win, one that the team desperately needed. It came thanks to a pair of touchdown passes by Collins and 130 yards rushing and a score from running back Chris Johnson. "It feels real good," said Johnson. "It was kind of like we didn't know what it meant to really win no more, losing six straight and then really coming in here and getting a win. But we knew coming out of halftime what kind of team Houston is, they are a second half team and they put up a lot of points. So we just had to keep our feet on the gas." JAGUARS: Jacksonville head coach Jack Del Rio came into the season on the hot seat and there is no guarantee that just missing out on the playoffs will save his job. The Jaguars visited the Colts on Sunday needing a win to clinch their first division title since 1999. Instead, they dropped a 34-24 game and lost control of their own destiny. Now tied for first place in the AFC South with 8-6 Indianapolis, it is now the Colts who can claim the division with victories in their final two games regardless of what the Jags do this Sunday at home versus Washington and on Jan. 2 in Houston. "It's a bad feeling in my stomach," quarterback David Garrard said of his team losing control of its own fate. "But I know that we still have two games left. We need to go out and get two wins to give ourselves a chance. You never know what happens." Garrard set a club record by reaching 22 touchdown passes this season during the Colts game, but Jacksonville's excellent run attack was limited to just 67 yards. Star running back Maurice Jones-Drew was held to just 46 yards on the ground after going over 100 yards in each of his previous six games. "They did a good job of stopping our run," said tight end Marcedes Lewis. "Not too many times that will happen." Though they need help, these next two games will test Del Rio. If he hopes to be on the sidelines for the Jaguars for a ninth straight season in 2011, he has to find a way to get his club back into the postseason for the first time since 2007. Del Rio's job now is to make sure his team puts this tough loss behind them before Sunday's big game versus the Redskins. "Go forward; get ready to play the next one," he said he told his players after Sunday's game. "People want to assume things about our situation. We get two more opportunities to play as a football team. We need to go out and take care of business. Obviously we need help, but it's certainly not impossible that we'll get some." TEXANS: So what is actually bothering Houston Texans running back Arian Foster? Foster, the NFL's leading rusher with 1,345 yards this season, was limited to a season low 15 yards on 11 carries in Sunday's 31-17 loss in Tennessee that dropped Houston to 5-9 on the season. Foster didn't finish the game due to injury, but it is unclear what is actually ailing him. Head coach Gary Kubiak said after the game that Foster's ankle was bothering him. "He missed one day of practice last week. It's a little sore, but he got his ankle in the game." However, Foster said after the game that he had a muscle spasm on the glut, but that he could have played. Few can blame Kubiak for leaving his stud back on the sidelines given the deficit. So is it Foster's ankle, glut or both? We may never know the truth, though Kubiak stuck by his story on Monday saying again it was an ankle issue. What is no longer an issue is the on-field scrum between teammates Antonio Smith and Brian Cushing. Smith became angry after he felt a Titans player tried to cut-block him and he confronted the culprit. Cushing went after his teammate and eventually lost his helmet, leading to a penalty. "What happened is [Cushing] came to me and I can't remember what he said, but he grabbed me and head-butted me," said Smith. "It was in the heat of the moment type thing. I grabbed his facemask to pull him close to me so we can get eye to eye to say what I had to say, and as we are doing that teammates come in between and the helmet comes off and it looks like a big ordeal." Cushing said on Monday that the two patched things up right after the play. Houston's setback over the weekend dropped the club to 5-9, meaning the club will finish with a record below .500 for the first time since a 6-10 campaign in 2006. That is without a disappointment for a club that came into the season hoping to make the playoffs for the first time since joining the league in 2002. "I am extremely disappointed about how the season went," said quarterback Matt Schaub. "We had high hopes, and expectations were high. We still have expectations for this team and organization. We just need to find a way to play better football for 60 minutes for 16 weeks." Houston will hope to snap a three-game slide and avoid its eighth loss in nine games this Sunday at Denver.

description.hltext_display: Sloan: An indictment against E&Y? Maybe not.
description.author: Allan Sloan
description.content:
If you are going to screw up, make sure that you are working at a company that regulators aren't going to let fail. That's the lesson not only for big financial companies but for the Final Four big national accounting firms as well.
That, I suspect, accounts for the way New York Attorney General Andrew M. Cuomo is suing Ernst & Young for its alleged role in helping Lehman Brothers produce misleading financial statements before it collapsed two years ago.
People are baying for criminal indictments of big names for their roles - make that alleged roles - in the financial meltdown and ensuing horrible recession. But Cuomo isn't seeking to indict E&Y, the nation's second largest accounting firm. Instead, he is seeking damages - based on the fees it got from Lehman - that E&Y or its malpractice insurer or whoever ends up writing the checks can cover.
This gives Cuomo chops for seeming to go after E&Y without him running the risk of putting the firm out of business. In the accounting world, you see, being criminally indicted pretty much puts you out of business as customers and partners flee, and you lose some of the licenses that allow you to do business. And I don't think any sentient regulator wants to run the risk of E&Y going out of business.
Call it the Arthur Andersen Effect. Andersen, you might recall, was indicted and convicted in 2002 for its role in the collapse of Enron. Just being indicted destroyed the firm, because partners and clients fled. By the time Andersen won on appeal, it was a husk of its former self, and what had been the Big Five accounting firms had become the Final Four.
Having the Final Four dwindle to the Terminal Three would increase an already unhealthy concentration among the nation's accounting firms, says Emilie Feldman, an assistant professor at the University of Pennsylvania's Wharton School.
Five years ago, I wrote a column based on her then-unpublished paper that said having the Final Four absorb Andersen's business would have violated antitrust guidelines had it involved a sale rather than a collapse.
So I asked Feldman - disclosure: her family and mine are close friends - to calculate the effect of the demise of E&Y. The answer: It would be even worse than the collapse of Andersen. "The increased concentration would clearly violate the guidelines," she told me. By Feldman's math, a collapse of E&Y and assumption of its business by the Terminal Three would add 733 points to the Herfindahl-Hirschman Index, which antitrust experts use to measure business concentration. The industry is already so concentrated that any increase of more than 50 points would violate guidelines and bring on an investigation.
Andersen's collapse, she said, increased the index by 455 points. Her paper, "A Basic Quantification of the Competitive Implications of the Demise of Arthur Andersen," was published in 2006 in the Review of Industrial Organization.
I'm not saying that E&Y doesn't deserve to fail, or that its partners shouldn't be punished severely. What I am saying is that Cuomo seems to be handling E&Y litigation more intelligently than the federal government handled Andersen.
The logical way to deal with Andersen's Enron role would have been to split the firm in two - a good firm with an accounting business that could be recapitalized with new money and a bad firm that would have been allowed to fail and take the partners' money down with it. That would have produced serious consequences for Andersen and its partners, but we still would have five big national accounting firms rather than four.
We sure don't want to go down to three. You can bet that the Securities and Exchange Commission and the publicly traded companies that hire big nationally recognized accountants don't want to lose E&Y either. Hence, Cuomo's suit with a bark far bigger than its bite. E&Y almost surely will settle, lest it have its dirty laundry aired at a trial, which it could lose.
So my bet is that E&Y gets whacked, fined and punished - but gets to stay in business. You don't have to be Citi or Bank of America to be too big to be allowed to fail.
Allan Sloan is Fortune magazine's senior editor at large.

description.hltext_display: Pothole or broken street light? GR City has an 'app' for that
description.content:
GRAND RAPIDS, MI (Michigan Radio) -
Grand Rapids has a new smartphone 'app' that people can use to report things like potholes and graffiti. IPhone and Android users can download the GRCity 311 application for free. Just head to your providers' app marketplace.
The city has been working to create programs that make it easier for residents to report problems. They already have a website. Paul Klimas, Grand Rapids' IT Director, says the smartphone application takes it just one step further.
"We've gotten poems about a pothole. A lot of people go out and measure them. I mean I could actually determine the volume based on their measurements."
He says these programs have a way of making city government feel more personal.
"Then we get these rather nice emails back (that said) 'Thank you for fixing my pothole for me.' And it's like 'wow', that's just a fantastic way to provide service and prioritize things - that's just fantastic. What if we did that for everything?"
City leaders are already moving in that direction. Plans are in the works to integrate city departments so residents have an easy, single point of contact.
Klimas says sending in images of problems, like potholes, is helpful for workers because it gives them an idea of what they'll need to fix it before going out in the field. Plus, GPS data will help determine an exact location.
©

description.hltext_display: Bakersfield floods cost city millions in damages
description.content:
A break in the wet weather Tuesday allowed crews to relieve some neighborhoods of major flooding. The relief came in the form of a pump truck. The city has secured 15 more industrial trucks to help in their clean-up efforts.
"I just finished picking up a load and I'm going to go ahead and take it to the canal and dump it," Santa Rosales, pump truck operator, said.
Truck after truck came into the Campus Park neighborhood in southwest Bakersfield to pump water and relieve a full sump.
Frank Echenique drove back and forth to suck up 4,000 gallons of water with his truck. He then dumped it into a nearby canal.
"I'm just a band-aid on a major operation," Echenique, ELCO Water Truck Owner, said.
The city said pump trucks are costly and aren't as effective as having a stationary pump to get rid of the water. The city said it's in the process of laying thousands of feet of piping to attach to stationary pumps that will drain directly into the canals.
The goal is to relieve more than 25 city sumps that have overflowed or are close to overflowing with water.
"We need to lower the level of all our sumps down to an elevation so if we have another occurrence, they are low enough so we don't have the issues that we just experienced," Raul Rojas, Director of Public Works Department, said.
Despite the progress the city has made, crews said it all could be reversed depending on the weather conditions this week.

description.hltext_display: Déjame oí­r tu latido
description.content:
¿Qué pasarí­a si controlar el ritmo cardí­aco fuera tan fácil como escuchar música mientras corre? Gracias a los avances en la tecnologí­a espacial, en breve un iPhone podrá realizar una doble tarea: mantenerle en forma con sus artistas favoritos y también sus signos vitales.
NOORDWIJK, Paí­ses Bajos, December 22, 2010 /PRNewswire/ -- ¿Qué pasarí­a si controlar el ritmo cardí­aco fuera tan fácil como escucharmúsica mientras corre? Gracias a los avances en la tecnologí­a espacial, enbreve un iPhone podrá realizar una doble tarea: mantenerle en forma con susartistas favoritos y también sus signos vitales.
Gracias al apoyo del Technology Transfer Programme (ESA TTP) de ESA, lacompañí­a de Suiza CSEM ha creado este año un prototipo final para suinstrumento Pulsear.
Una unidad delgada integrada en un auricular normalutiliza señales por infrarrojos para ver la rapidez del ritmo de su corazón.Enví­a señales infrarrojas por medio de los tejidos de su oí­do.
Un delgadofotodiodo registra los resultados y enví­a la información por medio de lasconexiones de los auriculares al instrumento que está conectado en suteléfono.
El resultado es una lectura precisa de su ritmo cardí­aco, sin laincomodidad de tener que llevar un cinturón en el pecho.
"Muchas personas escuchan música cuando practican ejercicio y también haymucha gente que considera que los cinturones son incómodos", comentó eldoctor Andrea Ridolfi, de CSEM.
Y añadió: "Así­ que pensamos que tení­a sentidoevaluar el ritmo cardí­aco por medio del oí­do".
Solución gracias a la tecnologí­a espacial
Los intentos primarios de CSEM para controlar el ritmo cardí­aco no fueronsatisfactorios, según el doctor Ridolfi, porque la tecnologí­a disponible noera lo suficientemente sofisticada.
Pero eso era antes de que CSEMdesarrollara un complejo sensor de pecho para evaluar los niveles de oxí­genoen sangre de los astronautas para el sistema Long Term Medical Survey de ESA."Un vez estaba hecho pensamos "vamos a reciclar esto", afirmó el doctorRidolfi.
Gracias a una beca de la iniciativa Technology Transfer Demonstrator deESA TTP, CSEM creó el prototipo.
La iniciativa presta apoyo al desarrollo delnuevo hardware y software para llenar el vací­o existente entre la tecnologí­aespacial y su uso terrestre.
Una aplicación de iPhone muestra el ritmo cardí­aco en la pantalla y locompara, por ejemplo, con el ritmo al correr de esta semana con la semanaanterior.
Las personas que han probado la aplicación durante sus sesiones defitness han puntuado con nota alta el dispositivo.
Mientras que el prototipoinicial evaluaba solo el ritmo cardí­aco, las versiones futuras podránadaptarse de forma fácil a la evaluación de los signos vitales adicionales,como los niveles de oxí­geno en sangre.
Esto podrí­a servir para utilizarse endiversas aplicaciones médicas.
"La transferencia de tecnologí­a del espacio cuenta con un potencialenorme para alentar la innovación en áreas que no esperarí­a encontrartecnologí­a espacial", explicó Frank M.
Salzgeber, responsable de ESA TTP."ESA TTP desea ayudar a la industria europea a aplicar sofisticadassoluciones espaciales en sus mercados".
Llamada abierta a los demostradores de tecnologí­a de transferencia:http://www.technology-forum.com/demonstrators
Más información: http://www.esa.int/ttp
European Space Agency

description.hltext_display: speech recognition software and article writing
description.content:
Edit Article | Posted: Dec 21, 2010 |Comments: 0 |
Share
I want to talk to you about how you can make money using articles but never actually type one single article yourself.
Right now, I am writing an article not with my hands but with my voice with the program that works with windows, you don't have to buy this program because it comes with windows. Imagine for one 2nd being able to write over 1000 words of content rich articles and never to even typing one sentence.
I will admit, I feel kind of bad that I am able to produce a lot of traffic and I never have to type one single word.
Article marketing is one of the best ways to capture an endless supply of Internet traffic and grow your business in a global market.
Because of the technology I am using, I am able to write while I'm submitting articles that I have previously a written to multiple article directory companies and I even write articles while I'm lying in bed.
Speech to text makes article marketing one of the easiest and quickest ways to gather traffic to your blog, videos, or affiliate web sites without the hassle of having to type a bunch of words or even worse having to worry about punctuation and or how well the article is setup.
My secret article marketing technique can be used to gather thousands of interested prospects within just seven days of implementing the techniques.
If you would like more information about speech to text for windows seven or Windows Vista; please follow the link at the bottom of the page to watch a free training video on how to setup your speech to text article marketing technique.
Step one- set up account with word press.com
Word press is a website for bloggers to write about pretty much any topic you can think of in the best part about word press is that it is totally free.
I'm not sure why but for some reason google, bing.com, and yahoo are obsessed with if information that comes from word press.
Within just 2 hours of updating information on your blog you can receive a steady flow of traffic that is completely targeted in because it's targeted traffic this will ensure that you will receive revenue for your efforts.
Once you have an account setup with word press you are ready to start promoting some products.
Step two- set up an account with click bank
Click bank is an online marketplace that brings vendors and affiliates together in one place. To keep it simple for you, you will be paid a two promote other people's products and you can receive as much as $500 per sale.
Don't tell yourself that you can do this because there are 1/2 dozen 16 year old kids that have made six of eight years using click bank.com.
Once you have a free account setup with click bank you need to go to the click bank marketplace; choose a product to promote by category.
You will want to make sure that the products that you are going to promote has a high gravity. You can find out what's the gravity of a product is by selecting the option at the top of the page there will be a drag down box that allows you to search for products by certain topics.
If a product as a low gravity this usually means that the product is for some reason not selling and you should stay away from these products.

description.hltext_display: La increíble historia del cuarto cheque
description.author: Encarna Maldonado
description.content:
El presidente del tribunal que juzga el caso Malaya, el magistrado José Godino, ordenó ayer un careo entre el principal acusado por esta trama de corrupción urbanística y política, Juan Antonio Roca, el promotor inmobiliario y teniente de alcalde de Marbella hasta 1998, Pedro Román, y el abogado Juan Hoffmann. El objetivo: esclarecer cómo y de qué manera participó Roca en Crucero Banús, una operación inmobiliaria que reportó 6 millones de beneficios en 2001.
Román aseguró la semana pasada que Roca entregó tres cheques bancarios, dos en dólares, emitidos por la oficina del Dresner Bank de Nueva York, y otro en euros expedido por la sucursal de esta entidad en Marbella, con los que afrontaba su participación al 15% en la compra de los suelos ubicados en Puerto Banús. Los cheques, según su versión, se los había entregado al abogado Juan Hoffmann, socio al 7,5% en el negocio y encargado de darle forma jurídica a la operación.
El 13 de diciembre, o sea el día anterior, Hoffmann había explicado que recibió los tres cheques de manos de Roca o Román y que él los ingresó en una cuenta en Suiza denominada Paula. Sin embargo, el pasado lunes Juan Antonio Roca precisó que no eran tres, sino cuatro cheques más 50.000 euros en efectivo los que había aportado para el negocio y que se los entregó a Román.
Ayer, durante el interrogatorio al que le sometió el abogado del Ayuntamiento de Marbella, que ejerce la acusación particular, Roca agregó que ese cuarto cheque se ingresó en la cuenta bancaria de Lispag del Reitchmuth Bank en Suiza y de hecho pidió que se exhibiera un listado de movimientos bancarios de esta sociedad, que fue la utilizada para formalizar la compra de los terrenos de Puerto Banús en 2001. El letrado del Ayuntamiento, Alberto Peláez, sin embargo, expuso que ese cheque bancario había vencido, por lo que no existiría ninguna garantía de que realmente hubiera sido cobrado. El principal acusado de Malaya, sin embargo, le restó importancia a este matiz porque únicamente era necesario que el destinatario final del cheque lo volviera a validar ante el Dresner Bank.
Y llegado este punto de tiras y aflojas fue cuando el tribunal, a iniciativa propia, instó a Pedro Román a que se sentara en la primera fila del banquillo de los acusados y ante el desconcierto general comenzó el careo.
Sin embargo, el encaramiento de los tres procesados arrojó poca luz sobre la historia que vivió el cuarto cheque. Román matizó que no podía recordar si fue él quien recibió los cheques y se los dio luego a Hoffmann y si en vez de tres en realidad eran cuatro y el último se ingresó en Lispag. " No lo recuerdo con exactitud. Roca tenía el 15% en una operación que yo tripulaba pero no me fijé en los detalles de las aportaciones de cada uno", aclaró. Juan Antonio Roca, llegado ese punto, aseguró que en ese instante ponía "en duda" si entregó los cheques a Román o a Hoffmann. Y finalmente el abogado apuntó que no recordaba "el detalle" del cuarto cheque, pero sí que, sin lugar a dudas, "Roca dio su aportación".
En definitiva, que el hombre fuerte del urbanismo de Marbella en los tiempos del gilismo puso su parte, que no sería entonces como sugieren las acusaciones una comisión encubierta, aunque ninguno pudo precisar con exactitud cómo. El amparo que los coprocesados se prestan entre sí dejó ayer en el juicio por el caso Malaya nuevos ejemplos. Así, Juan Antonio Roca, que constantemente alude "al alcalde", aunque sin nombrar a Jesús Gil, como el único responsable del urbanismo de Marbella afirmó que Julián Muñoz, en 2001 teniente de alcalde del municipio, se limitaba a "ir a firmar cuando el alcalde lo llamaba, porque el señor alcalde no firmaba nunca nada".
También le echó un capote a Juan Hoffmann, considerado por la Fiscalía Anticorrupción el artífice de la estructura de sociedades en el extranjero de Roca. Indicó que el letrado tenía poderes suyos para operar con sus cuentas suizas porque desde 2002 tenía prohibido judicialmente salir de España, pero que quien "mi estructura en Suiza" fue Karl Reitchmuth, presidente del Reitchmuth Bank.
A este banquero, con el que llegó a reunirse en España, le había confiado sus intereses en aquel país y era a quien pedía cuentas sobre el rumbo de sus inversiones en el exterior. También agregó que no estuvo al tanto de los detalles de la operación Crucero Banús porque "sólo participaba al 15%.

description.hltext_display: Violent crime down in Detroit, nationwide
description.content:
Detroit Police Chief Ralph Godbee
DETROIT, MI (Michigan Radio) - FBI statistics show violent crimes in Detroit fell by about 8-percent from the first half of 2009.
The biggest reduction, 28% was in homicides. They fell from 202 to 146. Robberies were also down about 9%.
The city did see jumps in rapes and arsons.
Detroit Police Chief Ralph Godbee attributes the crime drop to an "evidence-based approach" to police deployment and building partnerships with the community.
Godbee has said he's continuing the successful efforts of his predecessor, Warren Evans.
Evans was chief during the first half of this year. Mayor Dave Bing fired him in a flap over a reality TV show and a relationship with a subordinate in July.
Nationwide, violent crime fell about 6%.
©

event_or_fact.property: he's continuing the successful efforts of his predecessor, Warren Evans

description.hltext_display: Sjuk bonde fick rätt mot f-kassan
Fuengirola reparte 25.000 calendarios gratis con la imagen de Esperanza Oña
description.author: N. Alonso · R. Triviño
description.content: El Ayuntamiento de Fuengirola (Málaga) está repartiendo entre los vecinos 25.000 calendarios de 2011 que reproducen 13 veces a todo el alto de imagen (ver la fotografía que ilustra esta información) una gran silueta de la alcaldesa de la localidad, Esperanza Oña. El almanaque, que fue presentado públicamente el viernes, está sufragado íntegramente con dinero municipal e incluye además imágenes cedidas por un colectivo, aparte de cuatro postales y una felicitación. La idea del equipo de gobierno es repartir el almanaque por la ciudad (que no alcanza los 70.000 habitantes), según informó el Ayuntamiento en la presentación la semana pasada. El PSOE, principal partido de la oposición en la localidad costera, denunció ayer que el Ayuntamiento podría haberse gastado "50.000 euros sin IVA" en la iniciativa para felicitar a los vecinos las fiestas navideñas, aunque no presenta ninguna factura porque dice que el Consistorio no le facilita acceso a los gastos aprobados en la junta de gobierno local. La cifra es sólo una estimación tras pedir presupuesto en una imprenta. Fuentes municipales consideraron exagerada esa cantidad y rebajaron a una cuarta parte de la cantidad total lo que el Ayuntamiento habría desembolsado.El secretario de Organización socialista, Samuel García Tamajón, censuró que la alcaldesa "ha usado dinero público de los fuengiroleños para hacer propaganda partidista" y asegura que Oña "ha puesto el Ayuntamiento al servicio de los intereses del Partido Popular. Es indignante. El PP está repartiendo casa por casa este calendario para hacer propaganda política", manifestó ayer.La alcaldesa de Fuengirola es también la número 3 del Partido Popular en Andalucía y portavoz del grupo parlamentario en la Cámara autonómica y su labor de oposición en los últimos años se ha centrado especialmente en criticar los despilfarros, en los que, a su juicio, incurre el Gobierno encabezado por Griñán. Es, asimismo, una gran detractora de que se adjudiquen a servicios externos trabajos que, a su criterio, podrían ejecutar los funcionarios de las administraciones. Es otro de sus caballos de batalla contra el Gobierno regional.Curiosamente, los socialistas comenzaron ayer un recorrido por los hogares fuengiroleños para felicitar a los vecinos y obsequiarles con un calendario "pagado por los socialistas", según su candidato, Javier García León.

description.hltext_display: Costain says Mouchel rejected bid approach
description.content:
Engineering group Costain has confirmed that it has had a takeover proposal rejected by outsourcing company Mouchel.
Costain said it contacted Mouchel's board on 2 December, only for its approach to be turned down on 6 December.
Mouchel had already said it had received a preliminary takeover offer, but did not name the interested party.
Costain said it was now uncertain whether it would make a formal bid.
When Mouchel made its announcement on 6 December, its shares ended that day's trading up 28%. Prior to that they had fallen by 80% so far this year, as a result of the UK government and local authorities reducing spending on the new infrastructure development that the company provides.
Costain said it had proposed making an all-share offer for Mouchel at a 87% premium to Mouchel's closing share price on 3 December.
David Allvey, Costain's chairman, said: "The board of Costain believes that there is a compelling strategic rationale for combining Costain and Mouchel." Mouchel was founded in south Wales in 1897 by Frenchman Louis Mouchel. Today it has its headquarters in Woking.
Some of its earliest contracts included helping to build London's Earls Court Exhibition Centre and stands at Manchester City's former Maine Road stadium. Mouchel's current operations include half-ownership of Enterprise Mouchel, which has a contract to grit roads in south London.
Costain was established in Liverpool in 1865, but is now based in Maidenhead. It was involved in building the Channel Tunnel and the Thames Barrier.

description.hltext_display: El SAS respetará el margen de las boticas en la 'subasta' de fármacos
description.author: Alfonso Pedrosa
description.content:
El SAS afirma tener muy claro que su última estrategia conocida para generar ahorros adicionales en su factura farmacéutica es legal, no rompe la cohesión del Sistema Nacional de Salud y además respeta los márgenes de las oficinas de farmacia y las empresas de distribución. Sin embargo, la idea cuenta con la oposición del Consejo Andaluz de Colegios Oficiales de Farmacéuticos, que, hasta ahora, no lo ve claro. "Si las dudas de los farmacéuticos van por ahí, pueden estar tranquilos", dice el gerente del SAS, José Luis Gutiérrez. "No nos lo inventamos. Lo dicen las sentencias. Algunas, muy recientes, del TSJA, como cuando Farmaindustria cuestionó la receta electrónica o los odontólogos recurrieron la denominada receta enfermera. El Gobierno central tiene la potestad de definir las bases, pero la reglamentación, la gestión y la ejecución de las políticas es de las comunidades autónomas. Cada vez que se ha cuestionado -explica Gutiérrez- nuestra potestad para intervenir en la gestión de la prestación farmacéutica pública, alegándose motivos de invasión de competencias o de atentado a la equidad en el acceso de la población a los medicamentos, nuestros oponentes han perdido sistemáticamente esas batallas".
La consejera de Salud, María Jesús Montero, ha dado luz verde al SAS para ir definiendo el suministro de determinados principios activos a través de la figura de un concurso público. "No me gusta hablar de subasta -dice el gerente del SAS-, porque en realidad se trata de obtener descuentos, no de alterar precios". El fabricante que se haga con el concurso será quien suministre a las distribuidoras y éstas a las oficinas de farmacia para dispensar las recetas emitidas por los profesionales del SAS en los centros de salud. "Respetamos los márgenes de la cadena del medicamento, queremos hacerlo así. Por otro lado, introducir ese mecanismo de competencia entre laboratorios no es más que apelar a las mismas leyes del mercado que la industria invoca constantemente", dice Gutiérrez. "Más del 70% de nuestras recetas son sin marca, por principio activo. Le debemos a los profesionales de la sanidad pública andaluza nuestro máximo empeño en rentabilizar su compromiso con el sistema al renunciar a las marcas y así haber hecho posible la dispensación del mismo principio activo al precio más barato. Podemos llevar a cabo nuestro plan con los agentes representados por los colegios o sin ellos; preferimos contar con su apoyo, porque llevamos muchos años trabajando juntos en el uso racional del medicamento. Son aliados estratégicos, con ellos hemos logrado avances importantes. Pero no los vamos a esperar siempre".
Para Gutiérrez, la idea del concurso no es un capricho: "Todo esto tiene un contexto, hay que mirar el medio y el largo plazo. La crisis nos está enseñando que las relaciones deben evolucionar, redefinirse. Entre todos; por eso también hemos llamado a dialogar a la industria. Nadie sensato entendería, con la que está cayendo, que no trabajásemos por mantener la calidad de la prestación farmacéutica al menor coste posible", dice el gerente del SAS.

description.hltext_display: Holiday Bike Giveaway
description.content:
Let us know what you think! Click here to go to the KPTH Soapbox to post your own comments and view others Soapbox comments.
Let us know what you think! Click here to go to the KPTH Soapbox to post your own comments and view others Soapbox comments.
(SIOUX CITY, IA) Local law enforcement is helping make Christmases brighter for hometown children.
The Woodbury County Sheriff's Department received 22 bikes from the South Dakota Prison Industries, who refurbishes bikes from scratch, then rebuilds them and donates them to those in need.
The Sheriff's Department then contacted Sioux City schools and the bikes were given out to 22 families just in time to be put under the tree.
"It's a gift, I mean that they wouldn't normally get. And bikes, I think all kids grow up with bikes and it's nice. And when you can't afford that or you don't have that, yeah it's a good Christmas present. It's great as a little kid to see a bike under a tree," says Greg Stallman, Deputy Sheriff.
Deputy Stallman went on to say the impact that a bike can make on a children is the most rewarding part of this effort.

description.hltext_display: Arenas cree que "la gente de izquierdas" es la que propiciará el vuelco político
description.author: A. Fuentes
description.content:
El día después de la difusión de la encuesta del Instituto de Estudios Sociales Avanzados (IESA) que por primera vez da una holgada victoria al PP-A en una futura cita electoral (46,8% de los votos frente al 37,7% del PSOE) monopolizó gran parte del debate político. Tanto la Junta como el PP vincularon el vuelco demoscópico a los votantes de izquierda que han propiciado 30 años de gobiernos socialistas en la comunidad. Para el PP, éstos están desencantados y apuestan por la alternativa. Para la Junta y el PSOE, la tendencia hacia el PP es fruto del "enojo" y el "malestar" provocado por la crisis económica.
El presidente del PP andaluz, Javier Arenas, consideró en declaraciones a los periodistas que "hay gente de izquierdas que considera que ha llegado la hora del cambio, aunque muchos no coincidan al 80 o 90% con las propuestas del PP". Arenas leyó en los resultados del sondeo un "trasvase" de votos del PSOE al PP por el efecto de la crisis, los 30 años de socialismo y el "fracaso" del relevo de Chaves por Griñán, además de que el PP se sitúa "como el partido de la confianza".
Arenas desechó las comparaciones con las encuestas que daban una ilusoria victoria al PP en 1996, "con una IU muy fuerte entonces". El dirigente popular recordó la "carrera de obstáculos", desde los 26 diputados en 1991 hasta los 47 actuales, una progresiva "escalada" que en su opinión le legitima como candidato por cuarta vez.
Arenas consideró que la encuesta (sin proyección de escaños) sitúa al PP en la mayoría absoluta, que ponderó en siete puntos de diferencia con el PSOE, "ya que no cuesta lo mismo un escaño en Almería que en Sevilla" y que sería mayor sin la "cocina" que según el líder popular ha habido en contra del PP.
A falta de un estudio provincial, el presidente del PP-A destacó el "significativo avance" en Sevilla, Huelva y Jaén. Según otras encuestas de los populares, en Almería doblan al PSOE, en Málaga y Granada hay una diferencia "espectacular" y en Cádiz y en Córdoba "unas victorias muy claras".
Lectura muy distinta hizo la portavoz del Gobierno y consejera de la Presidencia, Mar Moreno, en la rueda de prensa posterior al Consejo de Gobierno, donde la encuesta monopolizó las preguntas de los periodistas. Enojo, malestar, desafección, retraimiento y por lo general preocupación por la crisis económica son las circunstancias que a juicio de Moreno han originado la caída del PSOE. Moreno se mostró segura de que, con trabajo contra la crisis, el PSOE recuperará la confianza de los ciudadanos y señaló que el PSOE es el partido que mejor defiende a la "gente normal, a la gran clase media y a la gente que no lo tiene todo", frente a un PP que "no crea ilusión". Moreno reconoció que la gestión política del Gobierno de Rodríguez Zapatero afecta "negativamente". "Se produce un efecto negativo sobre la política de la Junta, eso es evidente, pero respaldamos la difíciles decisiones del Gobierno central", precisó.
El ex presidente de la Junta y vicepresidente del Gobierno, Manuel Chaves, aseguró a los periodistas en el Congreso que su partido trabaja en la remontada y confió en que se "dará la vuelta" a los resultados. "Hemos salido de situaciones mucho peores que ésta. Queda mucho tiempo para las elecciones en 2012 y estamos convencidos de que vamos a remontar y darle la vuelta a esas encuestas", concluyó.

description.hltext_display: Governor won't commute sentence of man who may be innocent of murder
description.content:
Fred Freeman (aka Temujin Kensu) (Michigan Department of Corrections)
ANN ARBOR, MI (Michigan Radio) -
Governor Jennifer Granholm has refused to commute the life sentence of a man who insists he was wrongly convicted of killing another man in Port Huron in 1986. The case involves the Innocence Clinic at the University of Michigan Law School.
A spokeswoman for the governor says Granholm was following the recommendation of the state parole board when she denied Temujin Kensu's request to have his prison sentence commuted. Kensu was convicted of first-degree murder in the fatal shooting of a man who planned to marry Kensu's former girlfriend.
But questions about evidence in the case have raised serious doubt about Kensu's guilt. Kensu has always maintained that he was in the Upper Peninsula at the time of the killing.
He has the support of the Innocence Clinic at the University of Michigan law school, as well as former Michigan Supreme Court Chief Justice Thomas Brennan. In October, a federal judge vacated his conviction and said he deserves a new trial. Kensu remains in prison while the state appeals. ©

event_or_fact.property: first-degree murder in the fatal shooting of a man

description.hltext_display: El PSOE sólo acepta enmiendas de IU a sus presupuestos sostenibles y anticrisis
description.author: Charo Solís
description.content:
La incapacidad política de llegar a acuerdos dejará los Presupuestos autonómicos de 2011 sin ninguna aportación del PP. El Grupo Parlamentario Socialista sabe que, por séptimo año consecutivo, va quedarse hoy solo en la aprobación de las cuentas para el próximo ejercicio, como estaba escrito en el guión desde que se celebrara su debate de totalidad a principios de noviembre. Ni PP ni IU están por darle su apoyo. Sin embargo, los socialistas quisieron ayer tener un gesto de última hora, pero sólo con IU. Decidió admitir la incorporación de trece de las 265 que ha presentado -once de ellas se incorporaron en la sesión plenaria de ayer-.
Este guiño a la coalición de izquierdas tiene un valor de 3,54 millones de euros. Una cantidad que en ningún momento alterará la suma final ideada por la consejería de Hacienda que dirige Carmen Martínez Aguayo (31.682 millones, entre los que se incluyen los 32,7 millones incorporados a través de 40 enmiendas del propio PSOE en el dictamen de la Comisión de Hacienda). Simplemente se limitará a un trasvase de unas partidas a otras, ya que la coyuntura económica no permite nada que pueda aumentar el gasto, ni la Junta tiene ya mucho más margen para endeudarse.
Esta deferencia socialista hacia IU evidencia que los tiempos que corren son muy distintos a justo hace un año. Entonces, eran el propio Gobierno andaluz con su presidente, José Antonio Griñán, a la cabeza, quienes promovían un pacto presupuestario. Aquello se quedó en una sustancial rebaja, de negociación a simple llamada telefónica, pero permitió que, por primera vez, PP e IU colaran un nutrido paquete de enmiendas. Nada más y nada menos que 93 -72 del PP y 21 de IU-, y por un valor de 23 millones. Con lo que el rechazo de la oposición a los que fueron los primeros presupuestos de la etapa Griñán no fue tan rotundo o total, sino que fue algo parcial.
Este año, sin embargo, la sintonía es inexistente. Al PP ni una sola enmienda de sus más de 500, y de las trece de IU, dos son completas -una es sobre protección de patrimonio arqueológico de Jaén, por importe de 75.000 euros, y otro sobre incremento de las partidas para convenios y subvenciones sobre prevención de riesgos laborales, por 60.000 euros-, y las once restantes son enmiendas transaccionales.
Salvo esta pequeña concesión de los socialistas a IU, el minucioso debate consejería por consejería no deparó ninguna sorpresa más allá de lo ya visto y oído en el Parlamento, bien en pleno, bien en comisión, a lo largo del último mes y medio. El partido que sostiene al Gobierno defendió a capa y espada unas cuentas que calificó más que "adecuadas" para capear el temporal de la crisis y propiciar un modelo económico "más sano y sostenible". La oposición se dedicó a tirarlas por tierra considerándolas, por la derecha, una "chapuza contable" que, lejos de reducir, incrementará el paro; y por la izquierda, "reaccionarias" y como "la soga en la casa del ahorcado". De todas formas, este debate final dio pie a que cada una de las bancadas cruzaran críticas distintas a lo meramente numérico de los presupuestos. Aprovecharon la coyuntura para echarse en cara otras cuestiones, como la falta de austeridad, las críticas al decreto para la reordenación del sector público o "chiringuito para la colocación de parados", el "gran fracaso" de la gran caja andaluza, o la última encuesta del IESA. Un sondeo que, según el PSOE, hizo estar a los parlamentarios populares que subieron a la tribuna más "inquietos" de lo normal, con el fin de "ganar puntos ante su jefe" Javier Arenas, ya que de llegar a gobernar en Andalucía solo tendrá diez consejeros.

description.hltext_display: Mercato Roma, scambio Marchetti Cicinho?
description.content:
Se c’è un presidente col quale non è consigliabile fare affari questi è Massimo Cellino, anche perché pure stavolta il cagliaritano s’è messo in testa di fare l’ennesimo colpo.
